name: Ghost Blasters (TheAmbientBeard)
description:
Pick up your two blasters and exercise some ghosts from this mansion! Made for either PC VR or Quest 2 standalone; pull the triggers to fire at the hordes of ghouls and aim for your own high score.

This is a fun little Halloween game  I made for trunk or treat events and the like during the spooky holiday. Mainly for young kids who may not be as familiar with VR, games, or horror; it's easy to pick up and fun for players and viewers alike. 

Let me know what you think and if there are any bugs or suggestions.
